My projects

Some Things I Built

I like to stay busy and always have a project in the works. Take a look at some of the applications I've have built

01

Qoura Duplicate Detector

The Quora Duplicate Question Pair Detection project focuses on identifying whether two questions asked on Quora are semantically similar or duplicates. Using NLP techniques and machine learning models like XGBoost and Siamese LSTM networks, I built a system that accurately classifies question pairs, helping reduce redundant content and improve user experience.

  • Python
  • TensorFlow
  • PyTorch
  • Scikit-learn
  • NLP
  • LSTM/Bi-LSTM
  • Text Preprocessing
  • Word Embeddings
  • Live Site ‚Üí
  • Github ‚Üí

02

Resturant Recommendation System

The Restaurant Recommendation System suggests personalized dining options based on user preferences, location, and past behavior. By leveraging collaborative filtering and content-based recommendation algorithms, the system provides tailored restaurant suggestions, enhancing the dining experience and helping users discover new favorites based on their tastes and reviews.

  • Python
  • TensorFlow
  • Collaborative Filtering
  • Content-Based Filtering
  • Flask
  • Recommendation engine
  • Live Site ‚Üí
  • Github ‚Üí

03

Indian Startups Ecosystem Analysis

The **Indian Startup Ecosystem Analysis** project focuses on analyzing the growth, challenges, and trends within India's vibrant startup scene. By leveraging data analytics and visualization techniques, the project offers insights into funding, sectors, and geographical distribution, helping understand the dynamics driving India's startup ecosystem.

  • Python
  • Pandas
  • Matplotlib
  • Seaborn
  • plotly
  • Live Site ‚Üí
  • Github ‚Üí
